home.title: Kamil Wyremski - Full Stack Web Developer
home.description: Creating a modern, in accordance with SEO, responsive websites. Full Stack Web Developer
home.keywords: web design, web pages, web developer, web scripts
home.header.text: Best Modern Web Designs.{breakingLine}Through innovative design, your brand can achieve remarkable value.
home.introduction.subheader: Perfection is achieved not when there is nothing more to add but when there is nothing left to take away
home.introduction.text:
I love challenging myself so I can grow and become a better programmer. There are no bad ideas. With time, you can make anything better. What is most important is not to give up, to push yourself to move forward, gain better experience, and create with higher quality. Find inspiration in life and the people around you.

My customer's most common goal is to promote a business or product. My goal is to satisfy all their needs and requirements. My work is characterized by the highest quality and professionalism. No detail is overlooked. To create a successful website, I develop a clear customer experience vision. I work on understanding who your customers are and plan your website to create an emotional connection with them. Graphics, proportions, fonts, structure, colors, and content are crafted after hours of planning, testing, and comparing to meet the highest expectations. One of the most important keys to a successful website or other projects is user experience. A better user experience leads to better chances for the success of the business. Websites created by me are user-friendly, with modern graphics, and easy to navigate for any visitor, encouraging them to come back for more. The goal is to create a positive experience for your clients.

The websites I create are designed to perfectly represent your high-quality brand and products, and, of course, I will use the latest available technologies.

I look forward to hearing from you.
home.about_me.title: Full Stack Web Developer
home.about_me.brand: Front-End and Back-End Web Developer, specializing in creating secure interactive web pages and web applications.
home.skills.title: Skills & Expertise
home.skills.description: I have been designing web pages for several years now. As new technologies are introduced, I strive to incorporate them into my projects, enhancing the functionality of my pages. The appearance of my pages is on par with those created by large, professional companies.

home.skills.1.desc: Creating static or dynamic websites and web applications that comply with W3C standards

home.skills.2.desc: Developing SEO-friendly websites and offering search engine optimization consulting for websites and domains

home.skills.3.desc: I leverage the latest technologies available in my projects
home.skills.4.title: Apps
home.skills.4.desc: Developing advanced web applications for all mobile and desktop devices
home.skills.5.title: RWD
home.skills.5.desc: Ensuring that your website responds effectively to the medium on which it is viewed, including desktops and all mobile devices
home.skills.6.title: Graphic Design
home.skills.6.desc: Crafting modern, visually innovative concepts in line with the latest trends
home.skills.7.title: Programming
home.skills.7.desc: Delivering high-quality programming in HTML, (X|D)HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as back-end code snippets
home.skills.8.title: Fast Website
home.skills.8.desc: Optimizing website performance with advanced caching techniques and code minimization, resulting in smooth and fast loading times
home.technologies.title: Technologies
home.technologies.description: My skills encompass both programming and design, spanning front-end technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Angular, React, Vue, Ember, Next) and back-end technologies (PHP, Symfony, Yii, Laravel). Below is an overview of the technologies I work with:
home.technologies.1.desc: An interpreted scripting programming language designed for generating web pages (Back-End)
home.technologies.2.desc: A scripting programming language that can run on both the client and server side (node.js)
home.technologies.3.desc: A PHP framework based on the MVC design pattern, utilizing the latest programming standards
home.technologies.4.desc: Software used for creating web pages (commonly used as a blog platform, covering both Back-End and Front-End)
home.technologies.5.desc: Open-source e-commerce software, widely recognized and utilized for both Back-End and Front-End purposes
home.technologies.6.desc: Bootstrap is a sleek, intuitive, and powerful mobile-first front-end framework, facilitating faster and easier web development
home.technologies.7.desc: An open-source model-view-viewmodel (MVVM) front-end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications
home.technologies.8.desc: A JavaScript framework that supports the development of single-page web applications (SPAs)
home.technologies.9.desc: The language used for creating and presenting web pages, with the latest version being HTML5
home.technologies.10.desc: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a language used to define how a web page is displayed, with the latest version being CSS3
home.technologies.11.desc: A comprehensive graphics program designed for creating and processing raster graphics
home.technologies.12.desc: A JavaScript runtime environment primarily used for creating web servers capable of handling multiple concurrent requests
home.technologies.13.desc: A JavaScript library employed for managing and rapidly transitioning layouts in web applications
home.technologies.14.desc: An open-source operating system distributed freely, known for its stability and reliability
home.technologies.15.desc: A popular open-source relational database known for its speed and reliability, available on all major platforms
home.technologies.16.desc: A distributed version control system widely adopted across the industry for collaboration and code management
footer.text: High-quality, modern, responsive, and SEO-friendly websites. Construction of secure systems and web applications. Unique and original ideas to ensure the success of your website!

Quick help with the installation and configuration scripts on your domain and server!
script.language.title: Language change module
script.language.desc:
Script has a built language change module. It allows the display pages in the selected language. One language can be active at a time.

{breakingLine}

In addition, the script allows you to add your own language. Because of that, you can use our script with any language you can imagine, so you can use any foreign domain. This will allow you to hit more customers around the world!
